document_data.name: Rorlyn Handmane
document_data.mainbody: Lionar '''Rorlyn Handmane''' was a high-ranking officer of the [[Purple Dragons]] in [[Suzail]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: He was a Lionar among the [[Purple Dragons]].
document_data.History: After the explosion at the mansion of the [[archmage]] [[Larak Dardulkyn]], Rorlyn Handmane was sent by the [[War Wizards]] to investigate and offer reasonable aid, mindful that he may not wish to have his home surveyed by fellow workers of [[the Art]]. He was coldly dismissed by Dardulkyn, who was at the moment mind-ridden by the evil [[vampire]] [[archmage]] [[Manshoon]].
